name: Off Road Monster Demolition Trucking
description:
Off Road Monster Demolition Trucking

Monster Trucks are most attractive trucks. every people who love to racing games wants to ride on the truck,download this game and go for it.
Rride on your favorite monster truck and fight with other enemy truck to collect the flag.
Once you collect your flag go at your destination and drop the flag,and go to collect the other flag.
Be accurate because other enemy trucks are going to collect that flag so be quick and collect first.
Challenge the Different teams Like - Fighter Club, White Death, Hunter Ground, Evil Desert, Unknown Planet, Fighter Club etc....
this game includes the buch of Effective trucks,3D Graphics,3D Views and many more.
To know more about this game must download it...

Key Features

-> easy and effective controlling

-> 3D VIews

-> Different types of Monster trucks

-> User Friendly game

-> Totally Free Game,No Needs to purchase anything
